attributes.action: Revolutionise education for the disadvantaged -transform society- save £billions
attributes.additional_details: Schools’ grades and costs are impacted by disadvantaged families. Teachers must be trained as coaches to deliver whole-person curricula. Those parents/carers who are currently disengaged must be empowered to take responsibility for themselves & their families and to connect directly with teachers. Ask any teacher - supported children are empowered, amazing & display inner abilities & wisdom. READ MORE https://developyourchild.co.uk/join-the-revolution
attributes.background: The Depts of Education/Health & Social Care/Work & Pensions and OFSTED are acutely aware of the emotional and financial challenges/costs of supporting disadvantaged families. Govt response is short-term, reactive and lacks agility/willingness to act.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like changes to the education system, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
